structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.text: No such body shall be used for any purpose other than the promotion of science in the college represented by the professor claiming it nor sold or removed from this state.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2649.
